title: font reflecting peace of mind, caring
content: I'm doing a very simple, text logo for an insurance company. Their mission statement includes "Personal Attention, Peace of Mind." Any suggestions of fonts, or features of fonts, that reflect this idea?
author: dl

comments.content: Probably something conservative. A sturdy serif maybe. Sentinel from H+FJ might be nice.

2nd on Sentinel.

You might consider Georgia or Whitman.
